page.syntax: Return as P = Report.Fax(C LayoutName [,C Filter [,C Order ,P Options ]])

argument.name: Return
argument.description: A dot variable that contains the .Error.text element.

argument.name: LayoutName
argument.description: The name of the report to fax.

argument.name: Filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records for the report.

argument.name: Order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: Options
argument.description: A dot variable containing required and optional information for the Fax Service.

item.name: FaxNumber
item.description: The fax number to dial. Character Type. Required.

item.name: CoverPage
item.description: Path and filename of cover page file. Character. Not Required.

item.name: SenderHomePhone
item.description: Sender's home phone. Character. Not Required.

item.name: SenderOfficePhone
item.description: Sender's office phone. Character. Not Required.

page.discussion: The REPORT.FAX() method generates a report and queues it for fax transmission by the Windows Fax Service. Note : The fax driver first creates a PDF file, then faxes the PDF image. Because Adobe Acrobat is used to create the PDF file, the REPORT.FAX() method exposes a bug that leaves Adobe Acrobat running after the fax transmission.
page.example: Dim return as P Dim FaxOptions as P FaxOptions.FaxNumber = "916032510721" FaxOptions.RecipientName = "Pawan Deshpande" FaxOptions.RecipientCompany = "Alpha Software, Inc" FaxOptions.HasCoverPage = "yes" FaxOptions.CoverPage = "C:\Documents and Settings\AllUsers.WINNT\Documents\My Faxes\Common Coverpages\urgent.cov" FaxOptions.CvrPageSubject = "Hello World" FaxOptions.CvrPageNote = "This is the note text" 'FaxOptions.QueueFax = "no" ' Billing Code is an optional parameter FaxOptions.BillingCode = "" return = Report.Fax("report1","","",FaxOptions) if return.Error.text "" then ui_msg_box("Error",return.Error.text) end if
